Are you tired of trying to remember where you found that important piece of information while browsing the web? Do you struggle to keep track of research notes and highlights across multiple web pages? Look no further than the Highlighter Chrome Extension!

Our extension allows you to highlight text or images on any web page with different colors, making it easy to keep track of important information. You can also create notes associated with your highlights to provide additional context or reminders for later.

With our extension, you can easily organize and access all of your highlights in one place, making it simple to review important information and research notes. No more searching through multiple pages or notes to find the information you need!

The Highlighter Chrome Extension is perfect for students, researchers, or anyone who needs to keep track of information while browsing the web. Try it out today and see how it can simplify your online research and note-taking.
